column3: Faculty of Mathematical and Physical Sciences
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe digital revolution and recent advents in data science, machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) have sparked demand for next generation materials data scientists, able to utilise these emerging technologies for enhanced materials design and discovery. This programme will enable students to explore how the establishment of Processing-Structure-Properties-Performance (PSPP) relationships can be significantly enhanced using data driven approaches.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
